model_answer: A: He opens by declaring a new space race and explaining the microsatellite disruption, which is underscored by slides contrasting old and new satellites. He then diagnoses dismal launch options and argues that smaller rockets radically cut costs, before proposing mass-manufacturing and franchised production. The talk culminates with a vision slide shifting the industry from hardware-centric to software-centric, reinforcing his thesis of broader access.

The answer should be based on the details provided in the speech. Please listen carefully to the part of the speech where the speaker discusses operational readiness and scaling progress from concept to execution.
